content.task: Monitor GitHub Actions pipeline status after deploying smart compliance detection improvements
content.context:
We just deployed major improvements to claude-resistant-enforcement.yml that replace broad pattern matching with targeted detection to eliminate 100+ false positives while maintaining security. The commit b5aec3df was just pushed. Need to monitor the CI pipeline runs to confirm:

1. The "üîí Claude-Resistant Compliance Enforcement" job now passes
2. The "üõ°Ô∏è Compliance Guard Integrity Verification" job continues working  
3. Zero false positives are reported
4. Security enforcement remains effective

TECHNICAL CHANGES DEPLOYED:
- Replaced broad "pytest.skip" detection with targeted context checks
- Implemented smart git bypass detection (only actual --no-verify in git commands)
- Added intelligent CI suppression detection (only || true with bypass comments)
- Created focused bypass variable detection (explicit SKIP_COMPLIANCE_CHECK assignments)

Please provide pipeline status update and validation results.
